entry.title: Norbec - 10' x 10' Walk In Cooler with Remote Refrigeration
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norbec
Type: Walk In Cooler
Price: 0.00

The Norbec 10' x 10' walk-in cooler with remote refrigeration comes with thick 4" panels made of galvanized 26-gauge steel, which will prevent humidity and mold from entering your cooler. The interior dimensions are 9' 4" by 9' 4". The exterior height is 7' 6". The door hinges are self closing, which can overcome air resistance on heavy walk-in doors. And it includes a 2" dial thermometer to give you a clear reading of the temperature.

The cooler does not include a floor, but with its thick, high quality walls and powerful refrigeration system, your products will stay at a consistent temperature. Compared to a top-mounted refrigeration unit, remote refrigeration units require less ceiling height, but require an installation by a refrigeration company. We can install the walk in (or coordinate the installation) when you purchase a walk in with us. Contact us for more details and pricing on how we can help you with walk in installation. 

      • 10 feet deep x 10 feet wide exterior
      • Exterior height of 7' 6"
      • 9' 4" deep x 9' 4" wide interior
      • Door dimensions are 36" x 78"
      • The position of the door is interchangeable, right or left opening
      • Air-cooled condensing unit for indoor installation
      • 4" panels with galvanized 26 gauge steel
      • 1 phase
      • Door snubber (closer) saves energy and money
      • Magnetic gasket provides energy efficient seals
      • Self-closing door hinges adds extra closing force to overcome
      • air resistance on heavy walk-in doors
      • Toggle-style light switch with light-on indicator
      • 2" dial thermometer

SHIPPING

This is a special order item and will require a 3 - 4 week lead time.

WARRANTY

Two years parts, one year labour warranty. Five year warranty on refrigeration.

entry.title: Norbec - 10' x 10' Walk In Cooler with Top Mounted Refrigeration
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norbec
Type: Walk In Cooler
Price: 0.00

This Norbec 10' x 10' walk in cooler comes with top mounted "penthouse" refrigeration, which you are able to install yourself -- so you could avoid the expensive installation of a refrigeration technician. However, for warranty reasons, you do need to have a refrigeration technician come in to inspect your installation, but this usually only takes a short time, so the cost will be minimal.

Norbec specializes in walk in coolers, so they really know what they're doing. This cooler has thick 4" panels with galvanized 26 gauge steel, so you won't be getting any humidity or mold in your cooler. The door hinges are self closing, which can overcome air resistance on heavy walk-in doors. And it includes a 2" dial thermometer to give you a clear reading of the temperature.

The cooler does not include a floor, but with its thick, high quality walls and powerful refrigeration system, your products will definitely stay the right temperature.

This freezer has a 10.5' external height. And it is recommended that you have a clearance of 3' between the top of the unit and your ceiling. If you don't have that, remote refrigeration is available.

      • 10 feet deep x 10 feet wide exterior
      • Exterior height of 10.5'
      • 9' 4" deep x 9' 4" wide interior
      • Door dimensions are 36" x 78"
      • The position of the door is interchangeable, right or left opening
      • Air-cooled condensing unit for indoor installation
      • 4" panels with galvanized 26 gauge steel
      • 1 phase or 3 phase available
      • Best seller, easy to install
      • Penthouse refrigeration maximizes interior storage space

SHIPPING

This is a special order item and will require a 3 - 4 week lead time.

WARRANTY

Two years parts, one year labour warranty. Five year warranty on refrigeration.
